text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS It’s so obvious Trump doesn’t read the Bible. He couldn’t answer questions on which version of the Bible he reads or utter a verse. Is he sending Christians to their death by suggesting opening houses of worship.We already have statistic on ministers contracting covid-19 & dying!
